_description: A song of ‘Seeming’ — six quatrains and burden: ‘I may seyn & so mown mo / Þat in semenaunt goth gyle’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Semenaunt is a doner þingIt begylyt boþe knyght &
                    kyng…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Haue mercy & pete on vsWe leuyn here but a
                    qwyle
